plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_letters
plurals.item: Nenosiri lazima iwe na angalau herufi 1

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_lowercase
plurals.item: Nenosiri lazima iwe na angalau %d herufi ndogo
Nenosiri lazima iwe na angalau herufi 1 ndogo

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_uppercase
plurals.item: Nenosiri lazima iwe na angalau herufi %d kubwa
Nenosiri lazima iwe na angalau herufi 1 kubwa

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_numeric
plurals.item: Nenosiri ni lazima iwe na angalau namba %d za tarakimu
Nenosiri ni lazima iwe na angalau namba 1 ya tarakimu

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_symbols
plurals.item: Nenosiri lazima iwe na angalau ishara %d maalum
Nenosiri lazima iwe na angalau ishara 1 maalum

plurals.name: lockpassword_password_requires_nonletter
plurals.item: Nenosiri lazima iwe na angalau kibambo %d isiyo-herufi
Nenosiri lazima iwe na angalau kibambo 1 isiyo-herufi
